name: The Duxer
body:
### What is "The Duxer"?
"The Duxer" is an audio player build with the _new___ Media Elements API included in HTML5.
For now this is a basic version. You can see the tutorial of how this player was built in [my Youtube Channel](http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL08630EE40C632829).

### Action!

You can see "The Duxer" in action on: [http://rfdz.mx/tutoriales/demos/theduxer](http://rfdz.mx/tutoriales/demos/theduxer)

### Support
The Duxer works in the latest versions of web browsers. The player also was tested in iPod/iPad/iPhone.

### Contact
If you have any question or whatever you can contact me at: tutoriales@roofdier.com

### Social Media

Twitter: [@roofdier](http://twitter.com/roofdier)
Facebook: [/roofdierdz](http://facebook.com/roofdierdz)
Youtube: [@roofdier](http://youtube.com/roofdierdz)
